title: S12 Ep129: Oracle of the Dead
itunes:title: Oracle of the Dead
description:
Dr. Raymond Moody
Considered to be the Grandfather of the Near Death Experience Research Dr. Raymond Moody has been examining stories and experiences of the strange for years. Today he shares insights into Mirror Scrying, The Psychomanteum Experiments and how they may be connecting us to the other side. Plus a new and freaky friday edition of Theater of the Mind.

www.LifeAfterLife.com
